attributes.action: End Arriva Southern Counties (medway towns) contract
attributes.additional_details:
Arriva Southern Counties spend millions on new buses for the Medway Towns but now they are sending them off to different area's
and now we have these (http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3660/3586037461_ce6e7b89ac.jpg)

AND I FOR ONE HATE IT .... ONCE A WEEK IS OK BUT EVERYDAY IS NOT!!

SO LETS END ARRIVA SOUTHERN COUNTIES CONTRACT!! lol
